creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: massive eagle flexing its wings on a bank next to a waterfall near center; rocky shoreline on either side of waterfall; gnarled pine to R and above eagle, with hanging vines; brambles at L
marks: Signature and Seal ULQ L screen: [雲樵] {Unshō}
medium: Ink and gold leaf on paper
title: Sea Eagle amidst the Three Friends of Winter
